title: Docker and Containers

options.content:
### Source Context - Dashboard scope: multi-source / filter-driven - Selected log source filter: `${log_source:text}` - Selected service filter: `${service_name:text}` - Selected source type filter: `${source_type:text}` - Selected file path filter: `${filename:text}` - File path values in scope:
`${filename:join:
}` - Note: `All` means no extra filter. File paths above are listed one per line for the current filter scope.

panels.title: Logs
panels.description: Shows Logs (5m) for the current dashboard filters and time range. Use this panel to detect anomalies and trends quickly.

panels.title: Docker error count
panels.description: At-a-glance docker error signal for the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Error share % (expected idle)
panels.description: Share of source volume that is error-like. Healthy systems should stay near zero.

panels.title: Log rate
panels.description: Rate of incoming log events for the selected filters. Spikes indicate bursty behavior or changes in workload.

panels.title: Error-like rate
panels.description: Shows Error-like rate (5m) for the current dashboard filters and time range. Use this panel to detect anomalies and trends quickly.

panels.title: Error trend by service_name (expected idle)
panels.description: Service-level error rate trend for docker logs.

panels.title: Top containers by CPU
panels.description: Top running containers by CPU (mapped to container names).

panels.title: Top containers by Mem
panels.description: Top running containers by memory working set (mapped to container names).

panels.title: Top services
panels.description: Top services by docker log volume over the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Top service labels
panels.description: Top compose services by docker log volume over the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Volume by source_type
panels.description: Docker log volume split by source type over the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Top stacks
panels.description: Top stack labels by docker log volume over the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Errors by service_name (expected idle)
panels.description: Expected idle in healthy periods; shows service-level error/fail volume when present.

panels.title: Top docker error signatures (expected idle)
panels.description: Approximate recurring docker error signatures over the last 5 minutes.

panels.title: Drill logs
panels.description: Raw logs for the active filters. Use field filters and Explore to drill into incidents and root causes.

panels.title: Docker Errors
panels.description: Raw logs for the active filters and time range. Use search, labels, and Explore for deeper triage.

panels.title: Deploy/Restart markers (expected idle)
panels.description: Operational lifecycle markers; expected sparse except during maintenance/release windows.

panels.title: Logs by volume
panels.description: Breakdown of log volume by severity (debug/info/warn/error) for the current filters over a 5 minute window.

panels.title: Core containers CPU (% host)
panels.description: Share of total host CPU capacity used by each core container over 5m.

panels.title: Core containers Mem (current)
panels.description: Atlas/Grafana/Codeswarm-MCP current memory working set.

panels.title: Docker services by log volume (ranked)
panels.description: Top Docker service labels by log volume.

description: Canonical Docker and container operations dashboard combining container resource metrics with docker log/error triage.
